description:
Reply to this listing for more information.

______________________________________
Incredible, one of a kind historic townhome available in Washington Square West, one of Philadelphia’s most sought after neighborhoods!
Charming details include exposed brick throughout, original wood flooring and banisters, three decorative fireplaces, a cathedral ceiling with wood ceiling beams in the primary bedroom, a claw foot bathtub, a skylight window, and the location on a quaint no parking street lined with cherry blossom trees that bloom beautifully in the spring.
Upon entering, you’re greeted with a spacious living room with sconce lighting that leads to a reading nook and powder room. From here, access the whimsical shared brick patio with mosaic tiling and flower beds. Downstairs, you will find the completely modernized kitchen fit with a gas range, dishwasher, garbage disposal, and stainless steel refrigerator. There is plenty of pantry space for storage and an abundance of natural light thanks to multiple windows. The second floor of the home features a large bedroom with dual closets as well as the adjacent full bath. The third level boasts the primary bedroom with breathtaking original details, lots of shelving and closet space, as well as access to the private deck where you can sip on your morning coffee. If the property does not already entice you enough, the immediate neighborhood is home to some of the city’s best restaurants, cafes, and shops, and is walkable to numerous iconic parks and landmarks.
Don’t miss this amazing rental before it’s too late! 1 dog under 20 lbs permitted. $500 refundable pet deposit required.

The kitchen is modern and equipped with high-end Sub-Zero, Viking, Miele, and U-Line Appliances that are sure to make any home cook's dreams come true. The meditation garden is a peaceful oasis, with a calming waterfall feature that makes it the perfect place to unwind and recharge. The residents' lounge is a great space to socialize and connect with other residents, while the media room is equipped with state-of-the-art technology and comfortable seating, making it the perfect place to watch movies or catch up on your favorite TV shows. The outdoor terrace is a beautiful space where you can relax and take in the city views, and it's perfect for hosting gatherings or entertaining guests. The building is also pet-friendly and has an on-site dog run.
The Ritz Residences provides easy access to the arts, culture, museums, and world-class restaurants that Center City has to offer. title: ***Photos are of a similar unit, every unit is unique.***
description:
***Photos are of a similar unit, every unit is unique.*** Welcome to 1217 Spring Garden! This five-story building, the first reinforced concrete structure in the city, began life towards the end of the 19th century as the home of the Bilgram Machine Works and was later converted into this uniquely designed loft-style building featuring 40 units in its entirety. Each unit with its own DNA and original structure! As you enter the building using it’s smart building access controls, you’ll find a lobby designed to both pay homage to the building’s 19th-century industrial past and add some 21st-century gloss. You’ll also take notice of its wheel chair accessibility and new elevator in the former freight elevator shaft. Mail room is also located in the main lobby for convenience. Take a ride up to the 3rd floor where you’ll find unit 304. Walk right into the original industrial DNA design including its original hard wood flooring, loft, and brick exposed walls. You’ll surely take notice of it’s high ceiling and solid structure! As you move along you’ll find a large kitchen with plenty of cabinet storage and all of your essential appliances and your two nicely sized bedrooms. Your master bedroom includes a large closet and master bath! Make sure you stop by the fitness center and bicycle + skateboard storage room located on level B. Enjoy the tour!
1217-35 Spring Garden St #304
